sentences.en: a vast impersonal organization
sentences.cn: 庞大而不讲人情的组织

sentences.en: a voluntary organization which helps disabled people with their transport needs
sentences.cn: 帮助残疾人士满足其交通需求的一个志愿组织

sentences.en: an illegal terrorist organization
sentences.cn: 非法的恐怖组织

sentences.en: an immensely powerful organization
sentences.cn: 有巨大影响力的组织

sentences.en: an independent non-profit organization
sentences.cn: 独立的非营利机构

sentences.en: an organization of byzantine complexity
sentences.cn: 拜占庭式复杂诡秘死板的机构

sentences.en: I had obtained the authentic details about the birth of the organization.
sentences.cn: 我已经掌握了有关该组织诞生的可靠的详细资料。

sentences.en: international organizations such as the UN
sentences.cn: 诸如联合国之类的国际组织

sentences.en: Just as important, it has a well-oiled organization.
sentences.cn: 同样重要的是，其机构运行良好。

sentences.en: The move would cause irreparable harm to the organization.
sentences.cn: 这一举措会对该组织造成不可弥补的损害。

sentences.en: The organization changed its cumbersome title to something easier to remember.
sentences.cn: 这家机构把它那复杂累赘的名称改得好记一些了。

sentences.en: The organization helped defuse potentially violent situations.
sentences.cn: 该组织帮忙化解了可能出现的暴力局面。

sentences.en: The organization is cloaked in a shroud of secrecy.
sentences.cn: 这个组织笼罩着一种诡秘的气氛。

sentences.en: The organization now has around 18,000 members who receive a quarterly newsletter.
sentences.cn: 该组织现有大约18,000名成员，他们会收到一份内部通讯季刊。

sentences.en: The organization publishes a regular digest of environmental statistics.
sentences.cn: 该组织定期出版一份环境统计数据摘要。

sentences.en: The public expect high standards from any large organization.
sentences.cn: 公众对任何大型机构都期望很高。

sentences.en: The rift within the organization reflects the growing bitterness of the dispute.
sentences.cn: 组织内部严重失和反映出矛盾日趋升级。

sentences.en: The term "organization" often connotes a sense of neatness.
sentences.cn: organization这个词常常让人想到整洁。

sentences.en: the World Trade Organization
sentences.cn: 世界贸易组织

sentences.en: This extremist organization has shunned conventional politics.
sentences.cn: 这个极端主义组织有意避开了传统政治。

words.tran_cn: [有化] 有机的；组织的；器官的；根本的
有组织的；组织起来的（等于organized）
有组织的；安排有秩序的；做事有条理的
有机地；有组织地；器官上地
[生物] 器官；机构；风琴；管风琴；嗓音
组织者；承办单位；[生物] 组织导体
组织（等于organize）；有机化；给予生机
组织；使有系统化；给予生机；组织成立工会等

phrases.tran_cn: 企业组织；商业组织；实业组织
n. 政府组织；政府机构
世界贸易组织（产生于关贸总协定的乌拉圭谈判， 其目的是为促进多边贸易谈判和协议而成立的。）

trans.tran_cn: 组织（工作），安排，编排，条理
trans.tran_en: a group such as a club or business that has formed for a particular purpose
